event.name: Survey to find best date for a review session opens
event.description:
We will use this survey to find the best date for a review session.  Note that it is unlikely that we can find a time that will work for everyone.  If we end up selecting a time that doesn't work for you then I suggest that you work through things in your studying (sample exam, etc.) then find some time to visit me in my office to go over it.

If we pick one of the days on Dec. 10 or later I will have to remove availability of some one-on-one appointment time slots to make room for the review session.  Or the review session might need to be a bit short.  It might make sense to do two short review session on different days rather than one long one.
